title: Presentation techniques
brief_description: Provides materal suitable for assisting teachers to develop the skills they need in the presentation of Direct Instruction Materials. Notes scripts and formats, signals and group responses, how to present a lesson, how to practice on one’s own, how to use sample lessons and the importance of corrections. No other credits available
